definition: In a position immediately lower or under.
example: The instructions are provided directly below the image.
example_translation: Instrukcje znajdują się bezpośrednio poniżej obrazu.

definition: The name of the person to whom something is sent.
example: Please write the recipient's name on the envelope.
example_translation: Proszę napisać nazwę odbiorcy na kopercie.

definition: A space left at the beginning of a line to signal the start of a new paragraph.
example: Remember to indent the first line of each paragraph.
example_translation: Pamiętaj, aby wciąć pierwszą linię każdego akapitu.

definition: Money or assets used to fund a business or investment.
example: They are seeking additional capital to expand their business.
example_translation: Szukają dodatkowego kapitału, aby rozwinąć swój biznes.

definition: An act of asking for information.
example: They received an enquiry about their new product.
example_translation: Otrzymali zapytanie dotyczące ich nowego produktu.

definition: At a greater distance or more advanced stage.
example: We need further information to proceed.

definition: To be present at a meeting where someone is asked questions to determine their suitability for a job.
example: She will attend an interview for the manager position next week.
example_translation: W przyszłym tygodniu będzie uczestniczyć w rozmowie kwalifikacyjnej na stanowisko menedżera.

definition: Fitting in well with a person's needs, activities, and plans.
example: Let me know a convenient time for our meeting.
example_translation: Daj mi znać dogodny czas na nasze spotkanie.

definition: Trouble or difficulty caused to one's personal comfort or convenience.
example: Sorry for any inconvenience caused by the delay.
example_translation: Przepraszamy za wszelkie niedogodności spowodowane opóźnieniem.

definition: A breach of a law or rule; an illegal act.
example: He was charged with a serious offence.

definition: Suitable or proper in the circumstances.
To tell someone something positively to dispel any doubts.
example: I assure you that everything will be fine.
example_translation: Zapewniam cię, że wszystko będzie w porządku.

definition: In a willing and cheerful manner.
example: I would gladly help you with your project.
example_translation: Chętnie pomogę ci w twoim projekcie.

definition: Being a part of something or associated with it.
example: She is very involved in community activities.
example_translation: Jest bardzo zaangażowana w działalność społecznościową.

definition: A matter of interest or importance to someone.
example: Your health is our main concern.
example_translation: Twoje zdrowie jest naszą główną troską.

definition: To demand something forcefully, not accepting refusal.
example: She insists on paying for the meal.

definition: To strongly recommend or encourage someone to do something.
example: I urge you to reconsider your decision.
example_translation: Nalegam, abyś ponownie rozważył swoją decyzję.

example: A rainbow appeared after the storm.

word: Look forward to hearing from you
definition: To anticipate with pleasure receiving a message or communication from someone.
example: I look forward to hearing from you soon.
example_translation: Czekam na wiadomość od Ciebie wkrótce.
